plot: IMAX "Magic Carpet" film follows the life-cycle of millions of Monarch butterflies as they migrate from Canada south to the mountain valleys of Mexico.
title: Flowers in the Sky
plot_es: IMAX "Magic Carpet" film follows the life-cycle of millions of Monarch butterflies as they migrate from Canada south to the mountain valleys of Mexico.
plot_en: IMAX "Magic Carpet" film follows the life-cycle of millions of Monarch butterflies as they migrate from Canada south to the mountain valleys of Mexico.
